name: VoiceMailTel
overview:
VoiceMailTel is a high tech innovator and service provider of a unified telecommunication solution which effectively integrates PSTN, VoIP, cellular, voicemail into an all-inclusive package.

VoiceMailTel services radically improve productivity for business subscribers and their callers.

Our offers vary from simple 800 or local number voice mail to complex IVR systems including 800 Voice Mail, Virtual Office, Unified Messaging, hosted PBX and Integrated IVR.

VoiceMailTel is designed for entrepreneurs and busy professionals - thinkers who take matters into their own hands. That’s why we believe that if you had the tools to easily and affordably control your company’s communications, you’d do it.

All VoiceMailTel plans include these great features:

Toll Free Number Choose a toll free number that’s right for you: Regular toll free (866, 877, etc.), or a true 1-800 or vanity number (e.g., 866-CALLHIM).

Local Number You can live and work in one city and get a local number in another. Choose the area codes(s) that makes sense for your business. Find out how you can save on inbound voice calls.

Virtual Extensions Create the impression of a single office, regardless of whether you and your employees work from different geographical locations.

Music on Hold Reflect your business image through the music you play to callers-on-hold while also giving them a small incentive to hang on. And while you have their attention, why not make a service announcement?

Call Transfer Enable your incoming calls to be transferred away from your office so that you are more accessible and your business line is available for other incoming business calls.

Voicemail You get professional greetings, multiple delivery options. Pick up voicemail in emails or in your on-line account and play over your PC - or pick up by phone.

Call Forward Callers who dialed your toll-free or local number are routed to your phones - for instance, you can direct them to your cell, home, and office phones.

Call Waiting Avoid the busy signal, Call Waiting is a service that allows you to put one call on hold while you answer a second call and alternate between the two.

Custom Greeting Get your own custom greetings and music-on-hold professionally recorded, and then upload the recordings to your account. We’ve even partnered with a voicemail production service to help you with your professional recording needs.

Calling Card & Call Back Convenient, safe, and inexpensive: Use your local or toll free phone number to place calls from any phone, just like a calling card.

Caller ID How would you like to know the name and number displayed are those associated with the line from which the call is made?

Message Notification Get text messages on your cell phone or PDA alerting you about new voicemail messages. Never miss an important message.

No Hardware/Software Required Unlike traditional phone systems, VoiceMailTel’s services are totally virtual. You’ll be able to access the system from any phone, be it cell or regular touch pad phone.

Call History A record of your calls is stored in your Web-based account. You’ll see who called, the phone number, and the date, time, length, and result of the transaction.

VoiceMailTel Portal Access the main system set-up options, live call forwarding numbers, call reports, account history, billing, support center and other administration tools instantly via the web.

Directory by Name Improve your big business image with a company dial-by-name directory. Auto-generated, the directory provides a list of departments and employees to callers, who can dial by first or last name.

Voicemail Web Interface The Voicemail Web Interface will give you full control over your voice messages. This tool is invaluable for productivity.

VoiceMailTel Virtual Phone System Advantages:

Professional sound and image

get a toll free number easy to remember customize auto attendant and voice mail messages call your clients using only your business number Multi-offices and virtual extensions

connect your offices at no cost be available outside of office with virtual extension forward incoming calls to cell, or voicemail get notified about new voice messages by email Save money and time

no equipment to purchase or maintain no long-term contracts to sign make long distance calls at low rates we allow number portability 30 days free trial **Contact us for details at 1-866-6VOICEM (86-4236), 1-(416)-548-7388 or visit our website www.voicemailtel.com
